title: Fantasy Bidding with Staked Funds
description: Fans of certain NFT can't bid and win alone. Whales can dominate. Auctions happen all over but not by type. Fans need a 'place' to buy!
solution: Social site 4 fractional ownership without need of smart contract = per-NFT stakepool. Staked 'bids' earn and grow until seller gets excited
experience: content management, educational material creation, syllabus development, social psychology degree, intense anthropological interest
